name: Bala Flyer's Dream
body:
**Source** Alec Ellsworth
-
The Bala Plokami is the embodiment of freedom and fun, and very few things are more freeing and fun than omnidirectionally traversing land. You can activate Bala Flyer's Dream to call the Bala Plokami to you as it wraps around you and extends dozens of vines and starts smoothly grabbing branches, walls and the ground. 
- When active, you have a fly, climb and swim Speed equal to your land Speed - 10 feet, as long as you have the proper surroundings to utilize these abilities. 
- When active, and suspended in air, you will not have to make Maneuver in Flight checks, as the Plokami will maneuver for you. 
- When active, you have a +2 circumstance bonus to AC to projectiles small enough to be swatted by the Plokami.
